Title: Correlation of the basic reproduction number (R0) and eco-environmental variables in Colombian municipalities with chikungunya outbreaks during 2014-2016

Rebecca C. Christofferson: Department of Pathobiological Sciences, School of Veterinary Medicine, Louisiana State University, Baton Rouge, Los Angeles, United States of America
